page.title: 13HEALTH STRACATHRO
page.content: The{Hospital stands in 176 acres}and the surrounding grounds and gardens are maintained to a very high standard The Ward Blocks stand among lush, green lawns planted with rhododendrons evergreen, cherry and Wellingtonia trees. The wide lawn in front of the Mansion is used as a{heli-pad}and emergency supplies such as snake-bite serum or special drugs can be rapidly delivered from anywhere in Britain. {Tayside Police also deliver emergency {supplies from Ninewells Hospital in {Dundee}within a very short space of time. Each day, the hospital uses{88000 gals {of water and 2000 gals of oil. The hospital has{its own water supply {from an Artesian well}and its own water softening plant.
